text: 13.102 The use of genuinely water efficient fitments can lead to significant water, energy, and financial savings. Fitments need to be selected to be rated within the central or a better performance band of the voluntary Unified Water Label or the emerging UK mandatory water efficiency label. 13.103 All other residential development proposals must not exceed a maximum water use of 105 litres per head per day (excluding the allowance of up to 5 litres for external water consumption) using the ‘Fittings Approach’ in Table 2.2 of Part G of Building Regulations. Planning conditions will be applied to new residential development to ensure that 134 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES the water efficiency standards are met.
